item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @nalyhr nalyhr
item.description:
@nalyhr wrote:

2speced Source 317 (I Think) Link -
[ol][li]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=496133.0[/li]
[li][/li][/ol]

I Port forwarded, Put my IP in GUI.JAVA where it says this - (swapped 0.0.0.0 for my IP)

System.out.println("connecting to update server"); Serverip = "0.0.0.0"; sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip)); initUI(); }

Then i COMPILED it, added to WinRAR archive uploaded it to uppit sent it to my friends and when they try to log on they get error connecting to server.

What am i doing wrong…?

Yes the server is online and yes i sent them the client with my IP in it I can connect to my own server because the client I’m using is localhost but they cant connect to me and its getting really frustrating

Am I susposed to put my IP somewhere else? I couldnt find anywhere in client.JAVA to put it and i read somewhere that you put it in GUI.JAVA sometimes instead. When i search 127.0.0.1 and 0.0.0.0 in client.JAVA there are no results but if i search localhost i get this -

signlink.storeid = 32; //not really needed for us signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost()); method2(503, false, 765); //sets gameframe size }

And this…

[code] aBoolean959 = true;

   	    try {
            signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost());
                }
	    catch(UnknownHostException uhe) {[/code]

Do I put my IP in either of those anywhere? Sorry for all these nooby questions this is my first time trying to make a server and its not my greatest experience

… I cant deal with this i’ve been at it since yesterday at 5pm (its 11:30am the next day!) When i wake up hopefully i get some replys.

Read full topic
